section.name: How to use the Trail-Taglib
section.p: The trail taglib mainly comes down to two tags. The first is used to add a page into the trail, and the other is used to to list the current trail.
The push tag has an optional attribute named uri which will override the url stored in the trail, but hopefully this will rarely be needed.
The list tag has an optional attribute named type which specifies the type of list to create. By default the list will be normalized, but you can specify full to see the user's entire trail.
